articles.title: At 3 million years old, this newly discovered planet is one of the youngest, study finds - USA TODAY
articles.description: Forming an estimated 3 million years ago, the planet discovered by astronomers at the University of North Carolina is in its relative infancy.
articles.content:
A "baby" planet that astronomers recently observed some 430 light-years from Earth may be the youngest planet ever discovered.
Forming an estimated 3 million years ago, the planet may seem old to us… [+3601 chars]
